page.title: 08Religion.
page.content: There are three different Christian denominations in our area.They are {Church of England}(St. Materiana's, Tintagel, Trethevey){Methodist} (Tintagel Chapel and Bossiny Chapel){ {Roman Catholic}(St.Paul the Apostle) {St. Materiana's Church}also known as 'The Church on the Cliff',dates from Norman times and is mentioned in the first Domesday Book.The congregation is approximately 50.There is a Sunday school and study group.The vicar, Father Gregory,is also priest of St. Pirans. {The Catholic Church of St. Paul the {Apostle}is very modern with a copper spire.The priest:Fr.B.Storey.There are nine services a week. {Tintagel Methodist Church:}minister: Rev.J.R.Bickle.There are 2 services, Sunday School,a Fellowship and Space Hour for children during the week.
